                      Facade facade,
                      Boolean signRequest)
               throws BitPayApiException,
                      BitPayValidationException,
                      BitPayGenericException
        Create a BitPay invoice.
        Parameters:
        invoice - An Invoice object with request parameters defined.
        facade - The facade used to create it.
        signRequest - Signed request.
        Returns:
        A BitPay generated Invoice object.

        BitPayApiException - BitPayApiException class

      • get

        public Invoice get(String invoiceId,
                   Facade facade,
                   Boolean signRequest)
            throws BitPayApiException,
                   BitPayGenericException
        Retrieve a BitPay invoice by invoice id using the specified facade. The client must have been previously authorized for the specified facade.
        Parameters:
        invoiceId - The id of the invoice to retrieve.
        facade - The facade used to create it.
        signRequest - Signed request.
        Returns:
        A BitPay Invoice object.
        Throws:
        BitPayApiException - BitPayApiException class
        BitPayGenericException - BitPayGenericException class

                         Facade facade,
                         Boolean signRequest)
                  throws BitPayValidationException,
                         BitPayGenericException,
                         BitPayApiException
        Retrieve a BitPay invoice by guid using the specified facade. The client must have been previously authorized for the specified facade.
        Parameters:
        guid - The guid of the invoice to retrieve.
        facade - The facade used to create it.
        signRequest - Signed request.
        Returns:
        A BitPay Invoice object.

      • getInvoices

        public List<Invoice> getInvoices(String dateStart,
                                 String dateEnd,
                                 String status,
                                 String orderId,
                                 Integer limit,
                                 Integer offset)
                          throws BitPayApiException,
                                 BitPayGenericException
        Retrieve a collection of BitPay invoices.
        Parameters:
        dateStart - The first date for the query filter.
        dateEnd - The last date for the query filter.
        status - The invoice status you want to query on.
        orderId - The optional order id specified at time of invoice creation.
        limit - Maximum results that the query will return (useful for paging results).
        offset - Number of results to offset (ex. skip 10 will give you results starting with the 11th
        Returns:
        A list of BitPay Invoice objects.
        Throws:
        BitPayApiException - BitPayApiException class
        BitPayGenericException - BitPayGenericException class

      • getInvoiceEventToken

        public InvoiceEventToken getInvoiceEventToken(String invoiceId)
                                       throws BitPayApiException,
                                              BitPayGenericException
        Retrieves a bus token which can be used to subscribe to invoice events.
        Parameters:
        invoiceId - the id of the invoice for which you want to fetch an event token
        Returns:
        InvoiceEventToken event token
        Throws:
        BitPayApiException - BitPayException
        BitPayGenericException - BitPayGenericException

      • update

        public Invoice update(String invoiceId,
                      String buyerSms,
                      String smsCode,
                      String buyerEmail,
                      Boolean autoVerify)
               throws BitPayApiException,
                      BitPayGenericException
        Update a BitPay invoice with communication method.
        Parameters:
        invoiceId - The id of the invoice to updated.
        buyerSms - The buyer's cell number.
        smsCode - The buyer's received verification code.
        buyerEmail - The buyer's email address.
        autoVerify - Skip the user verification on sandbox ONLY.
        Returns:
        A BitPay generated Invoice object.
        Throws:
        BitPayApiException - BitPayApiException class
        BitPayGenericException - BitPayGenericException class

      • pay

        public Invoice pay(String invoiceId,
                   String status)
            throws BitPayApiException,
                   BitPayGenericException
        Pay a BitPay invoice with a mock transaction.
        Parameters:
        invoiceId - The id of the invoice to updated.
        status - The status of the invoice to be updated, can be "confirmed" or "complete".
        Returns:
        A BitPay generated Invoice object.
        Throws:
        BitPayApiException - BitPayApiException class
        BitPayGenericException - BitPayGenericException class

               throws BitPayApiException,
                      BitPayGenericException
        Delete a previously created BitPay invoice.
        Parameters:

      • cancel

        public Invoice cancel(String invoiceId,
                      Boolean forceCancel)
               throws BitPayApiException,
                      BitPayGenericException
        Delete a previously created BitPay invoice.
        Parameters:
        invoiceId - The Id of the BitPay invoice to be canceled.
        forceCancel - If 'true' it will cancel the invoice even if no contact information is present.
        Returns:
        A BitPay generated Invoice object.
        Throws:
        BitPayGenericException - BitPayGenericException class
        BitPayApiException - BitPayException class
